ygData.subject: Re: Armor and Dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, but you can forget about the dmg situation when you have a mino axe and FS long sword or Tentical whip with a Tommahawk!  that  PRITTY DEADLY!! ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, but you can forget about the dmg situation when you have a mino axe and
FS long sword or Tentical whip with a Tommahawk! that PRITTY DEADLY!!

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor and Dual wield
Date: Tue, 1 Jun 1999 11:19:32 +0900

From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

Always? I beg to differ. My character looks really good with 2 combine
scimitars thank you very much.

What is the Symbol of Loyalty?

Can someone tell me whats the point of plate? Most pieces are only 1ac
greater than banded (pants and chest are 2) and a LOT heavier. Is it just a
case of "every little bit (of AC) counts"?

Will smiths ever be able to make plate?

Thanks
